art.author: lynn_vinson
art.post: Thank you for your story! I feel we have all been blessed to see the real face of Jesus/Yeshua. I believe in the picture the little girl painted, you have been blessed more than any of us will ever know. I pray to see his face, but till then, I will simply look to to Prince of Peace painting.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
